meanings.definition: A structure of interconnected elements forming a complex whole.
meanings.sent1: The webworks of a spider's web help it catch insects.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a beautiful webworks sculpture using metal wires.
meanings.sent3: The webworks of the puzzle were so intricate that it took hours to solve.
meanings.sent4: The webworks of relationships in a small town can be surprisingly complex.
meanings.sent5: The webworks of a beehive are fascinating to observe up close.

meanings.definition: A network of interconnected threads or strands.
meanings.sent1: The webworks of a spider are strong and sticky to catch prey.
meanings.sent2: The fishing net was a webworks of thin nylon threads.
meanings.sent3: The webworks of yarn in the knitting basket got tangled up.
meanings.sent4: The webworks of a safety net protect workers high above the ground.
meanings.sent5: The webworks of a spider's web shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A series of interconnected websites or online content.
meanings.sent1: The webworks of popular websites attract many visitors.
meanings.sent2: The company hired a team to manage their webworks and social media.
meanings.sent3: The webworks of online articles kept readers engaged for hours.
meanings.sent4: The webworks of online shopping platforms make it easy to find products.
meanings.sent5: The webworks of a blog can reach a global audience.
